content: this pattern creates a beautiful scarf with an intricate diamond effect covering the scarf the scarf is created using the 8-row seersucker stitch repeating pattern with ribbing on each edge the pattern is written in such a way that it can be created to any desired length the pattern can be adjusted to be wider by altering the cast on amount as long as the cast on is a multiple of 4 plus 1 materials needed us 8 - 5mm needles tapestry needles 1 x 200g ball bulky weight yarn recommended yarn james c brett marble chunky in 23 gauge the gauge doesn t really matter as you can just adjust the cast on amount to create whatever width you want sizing you can create the scarf to whatever size you please this pattern is written to create a scarf 5 3 wide and in two lengths 36 child 70 adult please share your wips or finished objects with me on instagram @frankiecraftsco if you have any problems or get stuck or confused don t hesitate to contact me either on instagram or via my email info@frankiecraftsco com do not resell redistribute or copy this pattern all finished products made with this pattern may be sold with design credit to frankie crafts co
